channel.title: Skill Tab help [Pi]
channel.description:
[center]Well the problem is my construction and hunter skill won't raise to 99 or even any level when I make them 99. Every other skill works, but those won't. But they do add up total level but they just wont show up on the skill tab. It won't even show there exp. Can Someone please help? I'll rep.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/20rtdhv.png[/img]
Heres my playerassistant:
http://pastebin.com/qZMiUPuw
